name: Twitter_createdTimeTest
description: Unit tests for the createdTime method in the Twitter class, ensuring it generates dates within specified constraints.

test_cases.name: testCreatedTimeForward
test_cases.description: Tests the createdTime method with forward time constraints, ensuring the result is between the base and constraints dates.

test_cases.name: testCreatedTimeBackward
test_cases.description: Tests the createdTime method with backward time constraints, ensuring the result is between the constraints and base dates.
